Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Location in a 2D space using x-coordinates and y-coordinates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location(int x, int y)
      Creates a Location using the given x-coordinate and y-coordinate.
      Location(Location loc)
      Creates a Location that has the x-coordinate and y-coordinate of an existing Location object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double distance(int x, int y, Location a)
      Gets the distance between coordinates and a given Location.
      static double distance(Location current, java.util.ArrayList<Location> list)
      Gets the average distance between this Location and other Locations provided in an ArrayList.
      static double distance(Location a, Location b)
      Gets the distance between two Locations.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Determines whether or not this Location is the equal to another object.
      int getX()
      Gets the x-coordinate of this Location.
      int getY()
      Gets the y-coordinate of this Location.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Gets this Location's String representation, formatted (x,y).
      void xLeft()
      Decreases this Location's x-coordinate by 1.
      void xRight()
      Increases this Location's x-coordinate by 1.
      void yDown()
      Increases this Location's y-coordinate by 1.
      void yUp()
      Decreases this Location's y-coordinate by 1.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Determines whether or not this Location is the equal to another object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - Anything one would want to compare this Location to.
        Returns:
        a boolean value of whether or not this Location is equal to the given Object. True if both are Locations with the same coordinates. False otherwise.

      • distance

        public static double distance(Location current,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Location> list)
        Gets the average distance between this Location and other Locations provided in an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        current - The current location from which to take the distances
        list - The list of locations to which the distances should be measured
        Returns:
        The average distance from the current location to the list of locations
